title: Bronze ADC Seeking: Patient, helpful and ranked Support to help take my game to the next level
body:
I've been playing LoL for 8 months now and I've tried a wide pool of roles and champions and also 'mastered' a few champions. The majority of my game-time has been spent JG but I found you need a great deal of TOTAL game knowledge to pull it off in ranked. ADC is another role I've enjoyed a lot and it was the first role I ever got into. The interaction with your Support is really enjoyable I find and very satisfying when you hit a nice combo together and crush your opponents. So I'd love to become a high level ADC but have limited time in my day so I figure the best way to improve would be to play ranked with a high level Support who can give me feedback and help me sharpen my skills.

Right now I'm really getting into Jhin, he feels pretty natural for me and it seems he has a lot of depth. I'm pretty strong with MF but I've mastered her so I only like to use her when I don't really have any other choice, so the XP continues to flow. I can also use Ashe reasonably well, I'd prefer Jhin but Ashe would be my second pick. I have Skype and Teamspeak so we can communicate, I'm generally on after 6pm and in the morning if I'm not working.

replies.body: friend me and we can play when im on, usually im on weekends

Hey mate
Im a Top and Supp main in Plat elo 
Climbing the ladders with irelia/darius/jax for top
and Karma/Blitz/Brand

I can teach you how to get better for sure
Ill add you on my 2nd account
DG AU2K1N6
Thanks mate I'd appreciate that! I accepted your request, let me know if you're planning on getting on at a particular time :)
